summary: I didn't agree with the fact, at some finishing moves the game switches to 3rd person. It's killing the beloved immersion. So, I changed that. Why not?
descriptionHtml:
I didn't agree with the fact, at some finishing moves the game switches to 3rd person. It's killing the beloved immersion. So, I changed that. Why not?

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/rXCa2.png[/img][/url][/center]

Many people saw my "3rd Person Finishers only!" and asked why I couldn't do the same for players prefering the 3rd person view? So... here you are! This modification simply forces the game to only show killmoves in 1st person view.

IMPORTANT: Not compatible with "Killmove +"! We'll work on that.

Prefering the 3rd person view?
Here you are: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9805/?


___________
Installation:
NMM-Version: Use the NexusModManager. One-Click baby!
Manual-Version: Just unpack the archive, put both files in your Skyrim/Data-Folder and activate via the launcher!
___________

Also in the workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11160

Important: This mod is a beta-version. I would appreciate comments below, if everything works. Thank you!

Prefering the 3rd person view? Take a look on my "3rd Person Killmoves only!":
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9805/?
author: Timo theSoXX Schmidt
